DarkMouse::

She noted the voice commands and the hand signature pads. She would 
ahve to find a way to improve things around here. That is if she was 
going to stay a while. She saw the globe and looked at the hologram. 
The image was more refined than what she was used to. She would have 
to learn the upgrades since her slumber. She looked up at 
Galvatron. "Uh, pardon my ignorance, but why are you doing this? I'm 
not part of your troops? Why help me rejoin my comrads?" She took a 
step back. Preds don't do anything without expecting a payback. Or 
taking orders out of fear. So why was he doing this, she had to find 
out. 



--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  He used his voice command on the computer. "The ship is run mostly 
on voice 
> command. Mine alone. Then my hand print is put here." He pointed to 
a blank 
> pad" which brings us in. A holographic view of the globe popped 
up. "What are 
> the names of your colleagues? And you knew magnus when he began his 
group of 
> joined factions from maximal to preds. Im sure you'll remember in 
time"
